name: part_008
file: tmp_【#TheBrokenPromise】hololive English -Promise- 1st Anniversary Musical： The Broken Promise [Oi0WDyT6xTE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Continuation of the musical performance 'Duke Venomania's Madness'.
A transition scene where a giant book on stage closes and flips its pages to reveal a new set.
Hakos Baelz as Hexa the Bard in a tavern, lamenting her lot and then accepting a request to sing.
Hakos Baelz performs an English cover of 'Love Me, Love Me, Love Me'.
scenes.song_name: Love Me, Love Me, Love Me

subtitles.original: 今日もまた美しい淑女が
subtitles.english: Today, once again, beautiful ladies

subtitles.original: 僕の元　訪れる
subtitles.english: come to visit me.

subtitles.original: さあおいで僕の胸の中
subtitles.english: Come here, into my arms.

subtitles.original: 踊ろうよこのハーレムで
subtitles.english: Let's dance in this harem.

subtitles.original: 近づいた貴方を抱きしめ
subtitles.english: The moment I hugged you

subtitles.original: 微笑んだその瞬間
subtitles.english: as you drew near and I smiled...

subtitles.original: 突然の鋭い痛みと
subtitles.english: A sudden, sharp pain,

subtitles.original: 血に染まる僕の胸
subtitles.english: and my chest is stained with blood.

subtitles.original: 消えた恋人を探してた若者
subtitles.english: A youth searching for a lost lover

subtitles.original: 居場所を突き止めた悪魔の住む屋敷
subtitles.english: tracked down the demon's mansion.

subtitles.original: 若者は女装して悪魔に近づいた
subtitles.english: The youth approached the demon disguised as a woman,

subtitles.original: 懐の刀を悪魔に突き刺した
subtitles.english: and plunged a dagger into it.

subtitles.original: 毒を秘めた刀が刺さり
subtitles.english: The poisoned blade struck,

subtitles.original: 僕はその場に倒れ込んだ
subtitles.english: and I collapsed on the spot.

subtitles.original: 血と汗は混じり合いやがて
subtitles.english: Blood and sweat mingled, eventually

subtitles.original: 紫の滴へと変わっていく
subtitles.english: turning into purple drops.

subtitles.original: 術の解けた女たちは全て
subtitles.english: All the women, freed from the spell,

subtitles.original: 我に返り屋敷から逃げ出した
subtitles.english: came to their senses and fled the mansion.

subtitles.original: 僕のこと一瞬だけ見て
subtitles.english: Looked at me for just a moment...

subtitles.original: 最後に屋敷から出たのは
subtitles.english: The last one to leave the mansion was...

subtitles.original: あの幼馴染 待ってよ
subtitles.english: That childhood friend. Wait...

subtitles.original: まだ君に好きだと言ってない
subtitles.english: I haven't told you I love you yet.

subtitles.original: Ha...
subtitles.english: Ha...

subtitles.original: Why have I thought that I allowed myself to be walked into this quest?
subtitles.english: Why have I thought that I allowed myself to be walked into this quest?

subtitles.original: To suffer the odious hijinks of these bumbling fools.
subtitles.english: To suffer the odious hijinks of these bumbling fools.

subtitles.original: The crude, unsightly and boorish lot they are.
subtitles.english: The crude, unsightly and boorish lot they are.

subtitles.original: Me thinks they could scarce walk a straight line, much less perform.
subtitles.english: Me thinks they could scarce walk a straight line, much less perform.

subtitles.original: Or God forbid, dance.
subtitles.english: Or God forbid, dance.

subtitles.original: Ha...
subtitles.english: Ha...

subtitles.original: Their company doth abase me, who should be foremost among my peers.
subtitles.english: Their company doth abase me, who should be foremost among my peers.

subtitles.original: Humble bard I may be, but the world shall soon know of my eminence.
subtitles.english: Humble bard I may be, but the world shall soon know of my eminence.

subtitles.original: And fawn and adore me as they should.
subtitles.english: And fawn and adore me as they should.

subtitles.original: I may yet be unknown.
subtitles.english: I may yet be unknown.

subtitles.original: But soon, once this silly quest is over and I have my wish...
subtitles.english: But soon, once this silly quest is over and I have my wish...

subtitles.original: Townfolk will swoon over my ballads.
subtitles.english: Townfolk will swoon over my ballads.

subtitles.original: Royalty will beg me to grace their parties.
subtitles.english: Royalty will beg me to grace their parties.

subtitles.original: And the name of Hexa shall ring o'er hill and valley as the greatest performer this realm hath ever known.
subtitles.english: And the name of Hexa shall ring o'er hill and valley as the greatest performer this realm hath ever known.

subtitles.original: And then... And then...
subtitles.english: And then... And then...

subtitles.original: The stage is open! For any who might wish to perform!
subtitles.english: The stage is open! For any who might wish to perform!

subtitles.original: Is there none who dare take the stage? What of you, Miss?
subtitles.english: Is there none who dare take the stage? What of you, Miss?

subtitles.original: I see thee tapping thy feet for the songs. Dost thou dance?
subtitles.english: I see thee tapping thy feet for the songs. Dost thou dance?

subtitles.original: Oh, me? Wha... I don't know.
subtitles.english: Oh, me? Wha... I don't know.

subtitles.original: Oh, please give us a song, Miss!
subtitles.english: Oh, please give us a song, Miss!

subtitles.original: It won't make us think I sing.
subtitles.english: It won't make us think I sing.

subtitles.original: Well, thou art dressed like a singer!
subtitles.english: Well, thou art dressed like a singer!

subtitles.original: So a singer's garbs doth a singer make?
subtitles.english: So a singer's garbs doth a singer make?

subtitles.original: Very well. I'll do it!
subtitles.english: Very well. I'll do it!

subtitles.original: Good evening, ladies and gentlemen!
subtitles.english: Good evening, ladies and gentlemen!

subtitles.original: Are you ready for the greatest performance of your lives?
subtitles.english: Are you ready for the greatest performance of your lives?

subtitles.original: Ah, ah...
subtitles.english: Ah, ah...

subtitles.original: La-la-la-la-la...
subtitles.english: La-la-la-la-la...

subtitles.original: Once in a faraway, faraway world was a collar that coiled like a snake
subtitles.english: Once in a faraway, faraway world was a collar that coiled like a snake

subtitles.original: I want someone please - I need someone please
subtitles.english: I want someone please - I need someone please

subtitles.original: Oh, I listened close as it howled in ache
subtitles.english: Oh, I listened close as it howled in ache

subtitles.original: Please don't be angry and please don't abandon me.
subtitles.english: Please don't be angry and please don't abandon me.

subtitles.original: Don't leave me here on my own (kay?)
subtitles.english: Don't leave me here on my own (kay?)

subtitles.original: It wrapped itself tightly, daily and nightly - only with praise would it loosen it's hold
subtitles.english: It wrapped itself tightly, daily and nightly - only with praise would it loosen it's hold

subtitles.original: I placed in the top of my class~
subtitles.english: I placed in the top of my class~

subtitles.original: there's no one left for me to surpass
subtitles.english: there's no one left for me to surpass

subtitles.original: Don't I look cute in this dress?
subtitles.english: Don't I look cute in this dress?

subtitles.original: I really, really...
subtitles.english: I really, really...

subtitles.original: Must confess - it's tightening 'round my neck!
subtitles.english: Must confess - it's tightening 'round my neck!

subtitles.original: Give me your love, all of your love,
subtitles.english: Give me your love, all of your love,

subtitles.original: give me your love - all you can conjure up
subtitles.english: give me your love - all you can conjure up

subtitles.original: Give me your love, all of your love,
subtitles.english: Give me your love, all of your love,

subtitles.original: till you go mad with ecstasy
subtitles.english: till you go mad with ecstasy

subtitles.original: All of the hurt, all of the ache - help me escape! Take it, oh take it away!!!
subtitles.english: All of the hurt, all of the ache - help me escape! Take it, oh take it away!!!
